items.description: Use a template to deploy a Gaia hub on Amazon EC2

items.title: Gaia
items.description: Decentralized storage architecture for off-chain data

items.title: Linux
items.description: Steps to setup a GAIA hub on a Linux server (fresh install). This example is using Debian, but should work on any Linux distribution. It uses docker compose in the background.
